scripts.build: npm run d && npm run rollup
scripts.confirm: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist-secure && (rm -rf lib/**/*.jay.html.ts || :) && (rm -rf lib/**/*.d.ts || :) && (rm -rf lib-secure/**/*.d.ts || :)
scripts.mk-secure: npm run jay && mv ./lib/item.jay.html.ts ./lib-secure/main && mv ./lib/todo.jay.html.ts ./lib-secure/main && cp ./lib/item.ts ./lib-secure/sandbox && cp ./lib/todo.ts ./lib-secure/sandbox && cp ./lib/uuid.ts ./lib-secure/sandbox
